name: octane-test-runner-start-task
friendlyName: ALM Octane Test Runner Job Start
description:
This task is intended to support execution of automated tests from Open Text ALM Octane.
 The task searches for the "testsToRun" parameter which is sent from ALM Octane as part of the execution framework.
Once it is found, its value is converted to the format of the selected testing framework and injected to the "testsToRunConverted" variable.
Later, the variable can be used in the appropriate execution task.
For example: 
In maven task you can use it: 
options: '-Dtest="$(testsToRunConverted)"'
author: Open Text
instanceNameFormat: ALM Octane Job Test Runner Start
